title: March of loyalty to martyrs
shortDescription: It's a real footage of the March of loyalty to martyrs in Bahrain
longDescription: The March of loyalty to martyrs (Arabic: مسيرة الوفاء للشهداء‎ masīra al-wafāʾ ash-shuhadāʾ) was a protest on 22 February 2011 in Manama, Bahrain. Tens of thousands participated in the protest, one of the largest in the Bahraini uprising. Named after the seven victims killed by police and army forces during previous protests, the march filled the space between Bahrain mall and Pearl Roundabout. Protesters carried Bahrain's flag and demanded the fall of the government, implementation of a constitutional monarchy and other reforms, with some of them also demanding the end of the regime. More details at: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/March_of_loyalty_to_martyrs
